alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 05 at 7:18PM CST until March 05 at 7:30PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CST FOR NORTH CENTRAL JOHNSON AND SOUTHERN LINN COUNTIES... At 718 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cedar Rapids, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Marion, Hiawatha, Mount Vernon, Robins, Ely, Swisher, Shueyville, Bertram, Cou Falls, Squaw Creek Park, Marion Airport, Palisades-Kepler State Park, Cedar Rapids Municipal Airport and Paralta. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for east central Iowa.
